fixes.name: c portion
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau conditional aggregate SUM(IF [StoreType] = "c" THEN [Sales] END) to a DAX CALCULATE filter: CALCULATE(SUM('rossmann_sales_prediction'[Sales]), 'rossmann_sales_prediction'[StoreType] = "c"). The denominator SUM([Sales]) was mapped to SUM('rossmann_sales_prediction'[Sales]). This uses aggregation, so it is implemented as a measure.
